MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30pm to repair an underground cable fault due to 3rd party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:23PM on Thursday 25 February 2021.
